funding.description: This research was supported by a grant from the German Research Foundation (DFG) awarded to S. Pollmann and O. Speck (DFG PO 548/15-1). This research was, in part, also supported by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) as part of a US-German collaboration in computational neuroscience (CRCNS), co-funded by the BMBF and the US National Science Foundation (BMBF 01GQ1112; NSF 1129855). Work on the data-sharing technology employed for this research was supported by US-German CRCNS project, co-funded by the BMBF and the US National Science Foundation (BMBF 01GQ1411; NSF 1429999).
